title: At Close Range
description: In this Dateline classic, the body of a school superintendent is found by his home in western New York. As his family struggles to make sense of the horror, investigators look for answers. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 21, 2014.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
